report.title: Busphar Experiment
report.author: Deadhead
report.bodytext: Well, I never really thought much of this experience, until today I was browsing lycaeum.org and found that they added 'Buspar' to their psychoactive vaults. So, I thought I might as well add this trip report, in case anyone was curious about what Busphar does. /n /n First of all, some information about Buspar. /n Buspar is pretty easy to get, doctors would gladly rather prescribe it for anti-anxiety than they would -zepam drugs and alprazolam, diazepam, etc. etc. Buspar is also prescribed to people who are quitting smoking. /n /n Despite the fact that my last 3 trip reports that I sent to this site were not posted, I will remain un-daunted. /n /n Mindset: /n I just got the pills the period before (2nd period) and I had no idea what to expect, so I took 2. /n /n Experience: /n It took them about 25 minutes to kick in. I was reading and all of the sudden a shock wave went through me. I didn't know if it was the Buspar or not, but then another went through me, and more and more. I had a bit of a body buzz, nothing special. /n /n Then, it was lunch time, I was not sure if I should eat or not, but I did anyway, I still had a slight body buzz, but nothing much. Then, I went to fourth period, and I had a terrible headache and I was nauseous, this finally went away fully about 5th period. /n /n I gave away some tabs to some friends, and later that night, I cleared out the bag of them, another 2 15 mg tablets. /n /n I ate these and smoked a bowl of weed, and listened to 'Dark Side of the Moon' by Pink Floyd. When I went to go to sleep, I had a pleasant buzz going on and waves going through me. /n /n My Thought: /n Buspar isn't anything great at all, but if you do it, make sure you have some weed handy, it helps the buzz out alot.
